vlive.korean: 잠깐 들어가 있다가 해지면 나올까요? Should I go away and come back once the sun sets? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “오케이! 할로윈 ASMR” 할로윈 간식 먹방 ① (NCT127)

vlive.korean: 일단 루즈해지면 안되니까 저는 프레젠테이션 마치고 마시겠습니다. Since we can't get distracted, I'll drink it after the presentation is over. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : [펜타곤 교과서 시즌5] EP. 1 - 발표 시간
vlive.english: Since we can't get distracted, I'll drink it after the presentation is over.

vlive.korean: 해지면 바로 와야해. We are going back, when the sun goes down. 듣기 View video Boys Republic : 여행을떠나요~~~
vlive.english: We are going back, when the sun goes down.

vlive.korean: 이마가 펑퍼짐 하니까, 더 펑퍼짐 해지면 안되겠죠. The forehead shouldn't get flat anymore. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 하코냥, 얼굴형에 따라 다른 컨투어링 Contouring Makeup Tutorial
vlive.english: The forehead shouldn't get flat anymore.

vlive.korean: 점심은 엄청 더운데 이제 해 지면 추워지거든요. During the day, it's really hot, but at night, it gets cold. 듣기 View video iKON : 산책방송
vlive.english: During the day, it's really hot, but at night, it gets cold.

examples.korean: Also, if little children become popular at an early age, they may have a hard time leading normal lives later. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 또한 만약 어린 아이들이 어린 나이에 유명 해지면, 그들은 나중에 평범한 인생을 살기 힘들어질 수도 있어. TIMES CORE
